com.poesys.db.dao.query

Interface IQueryByKey<T extends IDbDto>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of IDbDto to query
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    QueryByKey, QueryCacheByKey, QueryDatabaseCacheByKey, QueryDatabaseMemcachedByKey, QueryMemcachedByKey

    public interface IQueryByKey<T extends IDbDto>
    An interface for Command-pattern data access objects (DAOs) that query by a key within a data transfer object (DTO)
    Author:
    Robert J. Muller
    See Also:
    IDbDto, IPrimaryKey, QueryByKey

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close any inter-query resources allocated by the Command.
      T queryByKey(java.sql.Connection connection, IPrimaryKey key)
      Query a DTO by the key of the object expressed through the same type of DTO.
      void setExpiration(int expiration)
      Set the expiration of objects queried by the queryByKey method.

    • Method Detail

      • queryByKey

        T queryByKey(java.sql.Connection connection,
           IPrimaryKey key)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                   NoPrimaryKeyException,
                                   BatchException
        Query a DTO by the key of the object expressed through the same type of DTO.
        Parameters:
        connection - the database connection with which to query
        key - the primary key with which to query an object; generic parameter must be a concrete implementation of IPrimaryKey
        Returns:
        a new DTO with the queried object
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when there is a problem with the query
        NoPrimaryKeyException - when the input DTO does not contain a valid key
        BatchException - when a nested set of objects has a problem with a batched query

      • setExpiration

        void setExpiration(int expiration)
        Set the expiration of objects queried by the queryByKey method. This setter allows you to change the expiration from the default value set by the factory.
        Parameters:
        expiration - the time in milliseconds until the object expires in the cache

      • close

        void close()
        Close any inter-query resources allocated by the Command.
